description: recto: darkly painted scene of a tall cylindrical structure on left side of image done in greens and yellow; fascade of buidling has large black squares with an "x" in each square; smaller buildings are seen in the foreground of the picture and on the right side of the image; verso: interior scene with windows done in purple pencil with a plant on a pedestal in the lower left outlined in green pencil; cardboard is thick and compressed
inscription: LLC of board in pencil, on verso: 2393
medium: Oil on thick cardboard (recto); colored pencil (verso)
title: Gasworks
